plot: A young man, working as a bodyguard for a wealthy but ruthless millionaire industrialist, becomes embroiled in the lives of the people associated with the business involving unscrupulous research in biological viruses.
plot_en: A young man, working as a bodyguard for a wealthy but ruthless millionaire industrialist, becomes embroiled in the lives of the people associated with the business involving unscrupulous research in biological viruses.
plot_es: A young man, working as a bodyguard for a wealthy but ruthless millionaire industrialist, becomes embroiled in the lives of the people associated with the business involving unscrupulous research in biological viruses.
title: Watch Over Me
